events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message regarding payment return qualifies this case under the Refund cluster.
Assigning the refund specialist team to handle this customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order issue. I'm sorry for the inconvenience caused.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can proceed with your refund?
Here's my order number 987654321, and I have attached the photo showing the incorrect product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a return label to send the wrong item back.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund offer. I will send the item back using the label provided.
Your refund has been processed, and you should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there's anything else we can assist you with.
Since you have confirmed receipt of the refund, we are closing your case now. Thank you for your patience.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
